message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. This is a great price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000, which is still a significant discount from my initial offer.  Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,450,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints, but $1,100,000 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to make one last concession and offer you the product for $1,350,000. This is my final offer.  I really want this product to go to someone who will appreciate it, but if you can't meet this price, I'll need to consider other options.

I appreciate your last concession, but $1,350,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,225,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair compromise.
